content:
Hi all, I am creating a profile using Observation resource. In Observation resource we have a boolean value for Observation.component.value[x]
But in forge it doesn't showing the datatype boolean.
Capture5.PNG Capture6.PNG

Hi @Mounika K are you using STU3? Because in STU3 Boolean isn't an option for observation.component.value[x] (http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/observation.html ). This has been fixed for the current nightly build, however Forge only supports stable versions, the latest being STU3.
